long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
if you aren't able to make decisions for yourself, use this. You input a number or a string and then press go to see what comes out.
 It's basicaly a chance of luck machine that will decide which one will appear. 
 If you input the same thing multiple times, the chance of it appearing will grow.
 If you have trouble making the decision to do, for example, 5 push ups per week, this will help.
